com.noelios.restlet
Class DirectoryRestlet

java.lang.Object
  org.restlet.AbstractRestlet
      com.noelios.restlet.DirectoryRestlet
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable, Restlet
public class DirectoryRestlet
extends AbstractRestlet

Restlet supported by a directory of files. A content negotiation mechanism (similar to Apache HTTP server) is available for files.

See Also:
FileResource

Field Summary
protected  boolean deeply
          Indicates if the sub-directories are deeply accessible.
protected  MediaType defaultMediaType
          Default media type used when no media type extension is available.

          If no file name is specified, use the (optional) index name.
protected  Map<String,Metadata> metadataMappings
          Mappings from extensions to metadata.
protected  String rootPath
          The directory's root path.
